game.title: The Lost Amulet
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient amulet from the depths of the Forbidden Temple.
game.description:
Legend has it that an ancient amulet with unimaginable power lies hidden deep within the Forbidden Temple.
        Many have tried to find it but none have succeeded. Are you brave enough to take up this quest and
        venture into the treacherous temple? The fate of the world may rest in your hands!

task.objective: Obtain the Temple Key from the Enchanted Forest
task.description: The Forbidden Temple is sealed off. Find the Temple Key hidden among the enchanted forest's clues and be wary of magical creatures.

task.objective: Navigate the Temple's Chambers, solve puzzles, and avoid traps
task.description: Once you have the key, reach the entrance of the Forbidden Temple. The temple's chambers are filled with challenges - use your wits to overcome them.

task.objective: Defeat the Guardian Beast in the Inner Sanctum
task.description: Battle the fierce beast to claim the amulet. This will be a test of strength and determination.
